Instance Method# destinationImageDescriptor(forSourceImages:sourceStates:for:suggestedDescriptor:)

iOS 11.0+iPadOS 11.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.13+tvOS 11.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
optional func destinationImageDescriptor(
    forSourceImages sourceImages: [MPSImage],
    sourceStates: [MPSState]?,
    for kernel: MPSKernel,
    suggestedDescriptor inDescriptor: MPSImageDescriptor
) -> MPSImageDescriptor
```
